title: Reply To Favor Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Reply To Favor Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Reply To Favor Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 198
items.transliteration: If someone does you a favour and you say: (Jazakal-lahu khayran.) then you have indeed excelled in praising him.
items.translation: If someone does you a favour and you say: (May Allah reward you with goodness.) then you have indeed excelled in praising him.
